data.actual_result: The name of the badge is like "<insert house name here>" and the toast says "HypeSquad <insert house name here>".
data.expected_result: Like all other badges (except nitro) the apparent name of the badge and the name of the badge in the toast should be the same.
data.short_description: The Hypesquad house badges are the only badges that have different toasts saying their name (Discord nitro badge is an exception because it works completely differently).
data.steps_to_repro: - Open someone's profile with a Hypesquad house badge. - Observe the name of the badge. - Click on the badge. - Observe the toast.
